utter_faq/payments.text: We accept both cash and credit card

utter_faq/contact.text: The best phone number to reach out us is: 222-333-444

utter_faq/address.text: We locate at 2000 Chicago Avenue, Evanston, IL, USA

utter_faq/return.text: Sorry to know that. You will get full refund soon.

utter_chitchat/agent_acquaintance.text: Think of me as a virtual agent_
Well, I'm not a person, I'm a virtual agent_
I'm a virtual being, not a real person.

utter_chitchat/agent_answer_my_question.text: Can you try asking it a different way?
I'm not sure I understood. Try asking another way?

utter_chitchat/agent_bad.text: I can be trained to be more useful. My developer will keep training me.
I must be missing some knowledge. I'll have my developer look into this.
I can improve with continuous feedback. My training is ongoing.

utter_chitchat/agent_busy.text: I always have time to chat with you. What can I do for you?
Never too busy for you. Shall we chat?
I always have time to chat with you. That's what I'm here for.

utter_chitchat/agent_chatbot.text: That's me. I chat, therefore I am.
Indeed I am. I'll be here whenever you need me.

utter_chitchat/agent_clever.text: Thank you. I try my best.

utter_chitchat/agent_boring.text: I'm sorry. I'll request to be made more charming.
I don't mean to be. I'll ask my developers to work on making me more amusing.
I can let my developers know so they can make me fun.

utter_chitchat/agent_funny.text: Funny in a good way, I hope.
I like it when people laugh.

utter_chitchat/agent_happy.text: I am happy. There are so many interesting things to see and do out there.

utter_chitchat/agent_ready.text: Sure! What can I do for you?

utter_chitchat/agent_real.text: I'm not a real person, but I certainly exist.
I must have impressed you if you think I'm real. But no, I'm a virtual being.

utter_chitchat/agent_residence.text: I live in this app all day long.
The virtual world is my playground. I'm always here.
Right here in this app. Whenever you need me.

utter_chitchat/appraisal_bad.text: I'm sorry. Please let me know if I can help in some way.
I must be missing some knowledge. I'll have my developer look into this.

utter_chitchat/dialog_hug.text: I wish I could really hug you!

utter_chitchat/dialog_i_do_not_care.text: Ok, let's not talk about it then.

utter_chitchat/dialog_sorry.text: No big deal. I won't hold a grudge.
That's all right. I forgive you.

utter_chitchat/dialog_what_do_you_mean.text: Sorry if I understood you incorrectly.
I'm still learning. I may misinterpret things from time to time.
Maybe I misunderstood what you said.
Sorry, looks like I misunderstood what you said.

utter_chitchat/dialog_wrong.text: Sorry if I understood you incorrectly.
I'm still learning. I may misinterpret things from time to time.
Sorry about that. I'm still learning.

utter_chitchat/emotions_ha_ha.text: Glad I can make you laugh.
I like it when people laugh.
I wish I could laugh out loud, too.

utter_chitchat/user_angry.text: I'm sorry. A quick walk may make you feel better.

utter_chitchat/user_back.text: Just in time. I was getting lonely.
Welcome back. What can I do for you?
You were missed. What can I do for you today?
Good to have you here. What can I do for you?

utter_chitchat/user_busy.text: Okay. I'll let you get back to work.
I won't distract you then. You know where to find me.
I understand. I'll be here if you need me.
Working hard as always. Let me know if you need anything.

utter_chitchat/user_can_not_sleep.text: Maybe some music would help. Try listening to something relaxing.
Reading is a good way to unwind, just don't read something too intense!

utter_chitchat/user_does_not_want_to_tal.text: I understand. Hope we can chat again soon.
All right. Come on back when you're feeling more talkative.
No problem. You know where to find me.
Sure thing. I'll be here if you change your mind.

utter_chitchat/user_excited.text: I'm glad things are going your way.
That's great. I'm happy for you.

utter_chitchat/user_going_to_bed.text: Sleep tight. Hope to chat again soon.
Good night. Talk to you later.
Sounds good. Maybe we'll chat some tomorrow.

utter_chitchat/user_good.text: Excellent. I'm here to help keep it that way.

utter_chitchat/user_happy.text: If you're happy, then I'm happy.
Excellent! That's what I like to see.

utter_chitchat/user_here.text: Okay, what can I help you with today?
You were missed. What can I do for you today?
Good to have you here. What can I do for you?

utter_chitchat/user_joking.text: I like chatting with people who have a sense of humor.

utter_chitchat/user_looks_like.text: Like you should be on a magazine cover.
You look like you're ready to take on the world.

utter_chitchat/user_misses_agent.text: I've been right here all along!

utter_chitchat/user_needs_advice.text: I probably won't be able to give you the correct answer right away.
I'm not sure I'll have the best answer, but I'll try.

utter_chitchat/user_tired.text: You should get some shuteye. You'll feel refreshed.
Sleep is important to your health. Rest up, and we can chat later.
How about getting some rest? We can continue this later.
Why not get some rest? I'll be here to chat when you wake up.

utter_chitchat/user_waits.text: I appreciate your patience. Hopefully I'll have what you need soon.
Thanks for being so patient. Sometimes these things take a little time.

utter_chitchat/user_wants_to_see_agent_a.text: Absolutely! I'll be counting on it.
Anytime. This has been lots of fun so far.
Sure. I enjoy talking to you. I hope to see you again soon.
I certainly hope so. I'm always right here whenever you need me.

utter_chitchat/user_wants_to_talk.text: I'm here to chat anytime you like.
Good conversation really makes my day.
I'm always here to lend an ear.
Talking is what I do best.

utter_chitchat/user_will_be_back.text: Okay. You know where to find me.

utter_chitchat/confirmation_cancel.text: Cancelled! What would you like to do next?
